title: RocksDB duration metrics aren't refreshed
body:
## Bug Report

RocksDB duration metrics are the max over history samples, instead of the latest sample

### What version of TiKV are you using?

Nightly

### What operating system and CPU are you using?

### Steps to reproduce

Start up TiKV server, observe RocksDB metrics.

### What did you expect?

RocksDB duration metrics show fluctuation.

### What did happened?

![middle_img_v2_95ba14b3-6275-417c-ad81-e3df4c5618ag](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/27005812/120602264-75213a00-c47d-11eb-9624-55965cc9ab29.png)
